text: Halmstads BK is an association football club in the town of Halmstad in Sweden. The club won Allsvenskan, becoming Swedish national champions, in the years of 1976, 1979, 1997 and 2000. They also won the Swedish Cup in 1995. ==References== == Other websites == * Halmstads BK Category:Swedish football clubs Category:Sport in Halmstad Category:1914 establishments in Sweden
title: Halmstads BK
